titleInfo.title: Monclova-Chavez v. McEachern et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER, signed by Magistrate Judge Sandra M. Snyder on 8/12/09: The U.S. Marshal is directed to effect service of process upon the U.S. Attorney and the Attorney General in accord with Federal Rule of Civil Procedure 4(i); Within 45 days of the date of service of this order, the U.S. Marshal shall submit to the Court a return of service, indicating service or attempts to effect service upon U.S. Attorney and the Attorney General; The Clerk's Office is DIRECTED to serve a copy of this order upon the U.S. Marshal. (Hellings, J)

titleInfo.title: Monclova-Chavez v. McEachern et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER Discharging 139 Order to Show Cause, signed by District Judge Anthony W. Ishii on 1/16/2013. (The Court ORDERS the parties to meet and confer at their earliest convenience for the purpose of preparing a joint pretrial statement and to file such statement with the Court by 4:00 p.m. Friday, February 15, 2013. The Court further refers the case to the Magistrate Judge for a trial-setting conference. The order to show cause is hereby discharged.)(Gaumnitz, R)
